rules_text: When Detention Officer enters the battlefield, you may exile another target nonland permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step.
notes:
WU:
 - Five or more artifacts
 - Metalcraft
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
WB:
 - triggered abilities
 - flicker
RW:
 - MV 3 or less
 - Shipwright
